thread.title: Toyota FJ Cruiser - In Photos: 15 Cars With The Best Resale Values - Forbes
thread.title_full: Toyota FJ Cruiser - In Photos: 15 Cars With The Best Resale Values - Forbes

author: Jim Gorzelany
title: Toyota FJ Cruiser - In Photos: 15 Cars With The Best Resale Values - Forbes
text:
15 Cars With The Best Resale Values
91.5% of original value retained after three years.
Perhaps absence really does make the heart grow fonder, as resale values have soared for this retro-styled truck-based SUV since Toyota discontinued it. It tops the list of vehicles that hold onto their original value best, as determined by NADA Used Car Guide. The FJ is a rough-and-tumble truck, but can be fun if you don't mind being jostled about.
Photo: Getty Images
